column4: what are you running?  and its confusion and slow at first 1 month but after you master them and talk to experts, read the forms,ask for help,,, in he end you get to know more here then in a class room you pay for and 90-97% is free(all the rest you pay for but they turn around and help give you the very free things you have know, just asking you to trade a bit of time...
